headline.main: U.S. IS SEEN FACING WORLD REVOLUTION; Herbert Agar Calls on Youth Here for Resolute Action to Prevent Our Destruction

lead_paragraph: Asserting that we are facing a world revolution that threatens to bring about the end of western civilization, Herbert Agar, editor of The Louisville Courier-Journal, called upon American youth for resolute action in an address last night at a rally of American Youth for Freedom, in the grand ballroom of the Hotel Waldorf-Astoria.
abstract: S at Amer Youth for Freedom rally, N Y C
